entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 10:03 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 10:03 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
